title: Video Card Issue
body: I have a problem i reinstalled league just few hours ago and i updated it then i started the champ select when it was time to go into loading screen my computer wouldnt it said ''An unknown DirectX error has occurred and League of Legends cannot start.Please make sure your video card is using the latest video drivers from manufacturer.'' How do i get the driver updates and what do i do please help

replies.body:
Ah, it sounds like your Video Drivers or DirectX assets may be completely borked. Not to worry! You should be able to resolve this after working through the steps within [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).

Please let me know if this helped!
